dict.acceptation: 讨论，谈论；论述，详述；商量；

sent.orig: Many of this year's films discuss movies discuss food, agriculture, and the ways that we eat.
sent.trans: 今年的很多电影都是讨论事物，农业和我们吃饭的方式。

sent.orig: Discuss methods of traffic analysis, how to count traffic, discuss quantitative methods.
sent.trans: 讨论交通量化分析之方法--如何计算流量。

sent.orig: OBJECTIVE: To discuss the management tactics and developmental prospects of fair-price drug stores in China.
sent.trans: 目的：探讨我国平价药房的经营策略及发展前景。

sent.orig: Objective To discuss the cause of cough after tracheotomy and put forward nursing countermeasures.
sent.trans: 目的：探讨气管切开病人术后咳嗽的原因及护理对策。

sent.orig: Today we discuss the green house greenhouse effect.
sent.trans: 今天我们谈论温室效应。
